body: query { shippingreceiptlist (pagination:{limit: "10"}){ shippingreceipts { id, status, trackingnumber, fulfillment_provider { id, name, provider { ... on Hashtag { name, username, password, threepl_customer_id, threepl_key } ... on ThreePL { name, username, password, threepl_customer_id, threepl_key, threepl_id, threepl_facility_id } }, created_at, updated_at }, fulfillment_provider_reference, history {created_at, status, detail}, created_at, updated_at }, pagination { count, end_cursor, has_next_page } }, }
